    public class MadvocServletFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    Madvoc filter serves as a controller part of the Madvoc framework.

      • processUnhandledPath

        protected boolean processUnhandledPath(java.lang.String actionPath,
                                       javax.servlet.ServletRequest request,
                                       javax.servlet.ServletResponse response)
        Process unconsumed action paths. Returns true if action path is consumed, otherwise returns false so to be consumed by filter chain.
